      • saveSalesRecord

        public static void saveSalesRecord()
                            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        saveSalesRecord saves all the invoices made to a file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file is not found
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with writing the object to the file

      • loadSalesRecord

        public void loadSalesRecord()
                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                            java.io.IOException,
                            java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        loadSalesRecord will retrieve all the sales from the file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file is not found
        java.io.IOException - if there was an error in reading from the file during input
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the class for storing the read data cannot be found
